descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][size=5][size=1][i]hi[/i][/size]
[/size][/size][size=3][size=5]Firstly, I want to thank [color=#cc0000]CDProjektRED[/color] for such an awesome game and being really cool about using their assets
so mods like this exist, all the meshes and textures belong to [color=#cc0000]CDProjektRED[/color] and I am NOT an official partner of [color=#cc0000]CDProjektRED[/color]. I got explicit permission to upload mods based on their weapon and
armour assets. I will screenshot the permission if a Moderator needs to
see it.[/size]

[color=#e06666][size=4]A big huge thank you to Blubberface57, Hurlocks and Pinkmrdoom20 for uploading some screen shots, you're awesome![/size][/color]
[/size][/center]
[color=#f6b26b]
[/color][center][size=4][color=#f6b26b]This is just a standalone weapon, it's The Bloody Barons knife from The Witcher 3[/color]

[/size][/center][size=4][b][color=#6fa8dc]Craftable and temperable at the forge

[/color][/b][/size][color=#ffd966][b][size=4]Installation: Drag and drop the files into your Data folder or install with your favourite mod installer


[color=#93c47d][b][size=4][size=6]Permission: [color=#d8d8d8]Please ask me first if you want to upload this to another site or include it with a different
mod, I will say Yes 99.9% of the time. If you don't ask first I will
report you to CDPR.

[b][size=4][size=6]Credits: [color=#900000]CDProjektRED[/color] for allowing me to use their Armour and Weapon assets and Bethesda for this cool game called [color=#6fa8dc]Skyrim[/color][/size][/size][/b][/color][/size][/size][/b][/color][/size][/b][/color]
author: PierreDorian
